name: @zennal/dsa
description: A comprehensive TypeScript/JavaScript npm package providing production-ready implementations of common data structures and algorithms.

scripts.build: tsc --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir dist && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --format=esm --outfile=dist/index.mjs && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --format=cjs --outfile=dist/index.cjs && esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --format=iife --global-name=ZennalDSA --outfile=dist/index.js

author: GIRISH KOR
